data.name: Realms of Magic - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Composed by Davi Vasc, Realms of Magic's soundtrack will take you on a mystical journey through the Old Kingdom. The 43 fantasy-inspired orchestral tracks evoke a soothing image of the tranquil wilderness of the Kingdom, while at the same time hinting at the dark secret that permeates the land.
data.about_the_game: Composed by Davi Vasc, Realms of Magic's soundtrack will take you on a mystical journey through the Old Kingdom. The 43 fantasy-inspired orchestral tracks evoke a soothing image of the tranquil wilderness of the Kingdom, while at the same time hinting at the dark secret that permeates the land.
